title: UNIT_gz_TEST gzTest.SDF fails SDF::Version(std::string) is deprecated

content.raw:
Output from [gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia #45](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/45/consoleFull)

345: Value of: "Check complete\n"
345: Expected: output
345: Which is: "\x1B[1;31mError [SDF.cc:360]\x1B[0m SDF::Version(std::string) is deprecated. The version can't be changed at runtime anymore.\nCheck complete\n"
345: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/tools/gz_TEST.cc:784: Failure
345: Value of: "Success\n"
345: Expected: output
345: Which is: "\x1B[1;31mError [SDF.cc:360]\x1B[0m SDF::Version(std::string) is deprecated. The version can't be changed at runtime anymore.\nSuccess\n"
345: [  FAILED  ] gzTest.SDF (5708 ms)
